name: Karate
description: Learn the art of Karate, a powerful striking martial art with a focus on discipline and self-defense.

name: Judo
description: Join our Judo classes to master throws, pins, and joint locks while building strength and balance.

name: Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu
description: Experience the ground game with Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu, focusing on submission holds and positional.

name: Striking
description: Train in the art of eight limbs with Muay Thai, emphasizing kicks, elbows, knees, and clinch.

name: Taekwondo
description: Discover the high-energy kicks and strikes of Taekwondo, an Olympic martial art for all ages.

name: Aikido
description: Learn Aikido, a martial art focused on redirecting an opponent's energy and protecting oneself.

name: Krav Maga
description: Master Krav Maga, a practical self-defense system known for its efficiency and real-world.

name: Capoeira
description: Experience the fusion of martial arts and dance in Capoeira, a Brazilian cultural treasure.

name: Kung Fu
description: Train in traditional Chinese martial arts with Kung Fu, exploring various styles and forms.

name: Kickboxing
description: Get in shape while learning Kickboxing, a high-intensity workout that improves cardio.

name: Wing Chun
description: Practice the close-range combat style of Wing Chun, known for its quick and powerful strikes.

name: Kendo
description: Explore the art of Japanese swordsmanship with Kendo, using bamboo swords (shinai).
